product_name: Icebreaker Relay Crew Long Underwear Top - Men's
long_description: Thanks to its ultralight merino wool, the Icebreaker Relay Crew long underwear top helps keep you comfortable during hikes, runs and other fast-paced activities in cool weather. Made of soft, nonirritating merino wool with a touch of spandex for stretch, Icebreaker Relay Crew long underwear top resists odors naturally. Ultralight merino wool wicks away moisture, dries quickly and breathes well to regulate temperature for outstanding comfort in cool weather. Fabric offers protection from UV light with a rating of UPF 50+. Raglan sleeves allow unhindered shoulder movement; thumbholes in the sleeves help keep hands and wrists warm. Flat seams reduce chafing. Slim fit. Machine washable; lay flat to dry.
short_description: Thanks to its ultralight merino wool, the Icebreaker Relay Crew long underwear top helps keep you comfortable during hikes, runs and other fast-paced activities in cool weather.
